name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: EG THE BEST
summary: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou includes the 19 scenarios of Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Sui, plus three additional scenarios making their console debut (Outbreak, Outbreak Kamikanshi-hen, and Hinamizawa Teiryuujo). It will also feature a new opening song and movie, 1080p resolution support in TV mode, and "Quiz Oyashiro Ver. 2018" (Higurashi series quiz mode).
